description.value:
At 6th level, you gain the ability to cloak yourself in a fey magic that makes others want to serve you. As a bonus action, you cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{Command}, without expending a spell slot, and you take on an appearance of unearthly beauty for 1 minute or until your concentration ends (as if you were concentrating on a spell). During this time, you can cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{Command} as a bonus action on each of your turns, without expending a spell slot.

Any creature charmed by you automatically fails its saving throw against the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{Command} you cast with this feature.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
